title: FS: Freeman EPDG and Orth SL Old Mill
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: FS: Freeman EPDG and Orth SL Old Mill
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a very nice Freeman with EPDG back graded SGC 50 and Orth Southern League with Old Mill Back SGC 35.  Both have great eye appeal and nice clean backs.

Asking SOLD For Freeman and SOLD for Orth.  Shipping included in price, prefer paypal f/f
